title: [HIGH] Fix silent error handling in store operations
description: Issue #4: Store operations silently ignore errors at lines 72-89, 150, 162, 260, 315, 330-342. Data corruption goes undetected.

title: [LOW] Add integration tests for hooks flow
description: Issue #34: Test wrapper→daemon→broadcast flow end-to-end.

title: Migrate Go types to generated types from TypeSpec
Refactor worktree handlers to remove duplication
Fix Rust PTY reader thread never stops
description: Issue #24: Store JoinHandle in pty_bridge.rs, implement stop on close

title: Add settings validation on write
description: Issue #33: Validate settings schema before persisting in daemon/websocket.go

title: Create AttentionSource interface and aggregator
description: Create internal/attention/ package with AttentionSource interface. Make Session and PR implement it. Create aggregator for unified attention logic. This is the foundation that enables cleaner frontend hooks.

title: Technical Strategy Implementation
description: Track remaining items from docs/plans/2025-12-13-technical-strategy.md - Phase 4 Test Harness

title: Standardize protocol naming - Cmd vs Msg prefix (Issue #10)
description: Mixed prefixes in protocol/types.go: CmdRegister, MsgApprovePR, EventRefreshPRsResult. Standardize to Cmd for commands, Event for responses.

title: Document and fix async pattern inconsistency
description: Issue #16: Some operations fire-and-forget, others use Promise. Use Promise for all mutations.

title: Isolate Claude adapter into agent/claude package
description: Phase 1 from tech strategy: Move Claude-specific code (hooks, transcript, classifier) to internal/agent/claude/

title: Extract usePRsNeedingAttention hook (Issue #7)
description: Create hook that uses AttentionSource aggregator. Replaces duplicated filter pattern in App.tsx, Dashboard.tsx, AttentionDrawer.tsx. Depends on AttentionSource being done first.

title: Phase 1: Git branch operations
description: Create internal/git/branch.go with ListBranches, DeleteBranch, SwitchBranch

title: Fix WebSocket broadcast backpressure (messages dropped silently)
Tech Debt Cleanup
description: Track remaining items from docs/plans/2025-12-13-tech-debt-analysis.md

title: Type migration: Migrate store package
description: Update store.go and store_test.go to use generated types

title: Create unified StateIndicator component (Issue #8)
description: Replace duplicated state indicator patterns (state-indicator, state-dot, item-dot classes) with single reusable component supporting size variants.

title: Type migration: Create helper types and functions
description: Add Timestamp type, pointer helper functions (deref, ptr), update imports

title: Type migration: Migrate daemon package
description: Update daemon.go, websocket.go, worktree.go, daemon_test.go

title: Fix WebSocket backpressure - drop slow clients
description: Issue #5: WebSocket broadcast drops messages silently. Track slow clients, drop connection instead of message.

title: Create getRepoName utility function
description: Issue #22: Repo name extraction duplicated 4x in App.tsx, Dashboard.tsx, AttentionDrawer.tsx

title: [MED] Split LocationPicker.tsx (606 lines, 13 useState)
description: Issue #9: Too many responsibilities. Split into LocationInput, WorktreeSelector, useLocationKeyboard, useWorktreeFlow.

title: Remove useLocationHistory.ts
description: Delete local file-based location history hook after daemon migration

title: PTY server: add buffer size limit
description: Issue #14: Unbounded buffer in PTY server. Add 1MB max limit to prevent memory exhaustion.

title: Type migration: Update TypeSpec for required fields
description: Make always-present fields required (not optional) to reduce pointer usage

title: [HIGH] Extract shared worktree handler logic
description: Issue #1: 6 handlers with 3 pairs of near-identical implementations in worktree.go. Extract doListWorktrees, doCreateWorktree, doDeleteWorktree helpers.

description: Remove old types.go, run tests, verify build

title: Fix WebSocket backpressure - drop slow clients not messages

title: Update planning docs with final status
description: After completing all items, update docs/plans/2025-12-13-tech-debt-analysis.md with final status for each item.

title: Define shared PTY protocol types (Issue #3)
description: Node.js pty-server and Rust pty_bridge have hardcoded strings for commands/events. Create shared TypeScript protocol definition.

title: Phase 2: Protocol types
description: Add Branch model and commands to TypeSpec

title: [LOW] Fix logger mutex race condition
description: Issue #21: d.logger accessed without lock in logf(). Could race with logger being set to nil during Stop().

description: Command message and result event for fetching recent locations

title: Fix PTY event listeners not removed on exit
description: Issue #23: Call ptyProcess.removeAllListeners() in onExit handler

description: Issue #30: Add /health endpoint for daemon readiness checks

title: Remove duplicate ActionState interfaces
description: Issue #19: ActionState defined in 3 places. Define once in types.
